annotations.description: The Bacardi Cocktail (or The Cuban #2) was created sometime around 1917 in Cuba. There are two different ideas about this drink and it's ingredients. The fir...
annotations.title: The Strange and Terrible Tale Of The Bacardi Cocktail

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) White Rum
.5oz (15ml) Gin
.75oz (22.5ml) Grenadine
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
Maraschino Cherry Garnish

Shake and strain into coupe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cnOXBeQ0O9E
title: Bacardi Cocktail
